name: GOBLIN RUN (Matt Barninger)
description:
Choose your own narrative path as you embark on a quest to save your mother and find your father.  It's night in the fantasy village you call home and a rain storm has brought flash flooding that has inundated the village.  Now you must brave the elements to find  a magical mushroom. 

  • Featuring over 12 different endings.
  • Player may choose between lawful and chaotic paths.
  • There is a streamlined version of the quest featuring a magical talking horse, good luck finding it. Trust me, it's in there.
  • Featuring multiple death endings with the ability to replay the previous scene  or restart completely.
